Package io.nem.symbol.sdk.infrastructure

Class BinarySerializationImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.nem.symbol.sdk.infrastructure.BinarySerializationImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BinarySerialization
    public class BinarySerializationImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements BinarySerialization
    Implementation of BinarySerialization. It uses the catbuffer generated builders to deserialize an object.

      • deserializeToFactory

        public TransactionFactory<?> deserializeToFactory​(byte[] payload)
        Deserialization of transactions. All the code related to the deserialization is handled in the class and its helpers. Transaction Model Objects are not polluted with deserialization functionality.
        Specified by:
        deserializeToFactory in interface BinarySerialization
        Parameters:
        payload - the byte array payload
        Returns:
        the TransactionFactory.
